item.title: How do i make my compile work?
item.dc:creator: @reapagescapeftw1 reapagescapeftw
item.description:
@reapagescapeftw1 wrote:

alright? well you can use my compiler i guess

@echo off color 0a title Bibsie Scape Compiler V. 1.2 if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiled pause exit

Enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my compile work?
item.dc:creator: @im_cool im cool
item.description:
@im_cool wrote:

i have this in it @echo off
title ‘‘yourservernamehere’’ Compiler
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_06in/java.exe” server
pause

i have the 6 and u have 7 when i open it it says this
The system cannot find the path specified.
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

so it says it works but it cant find something? do i have to worry about that? and when people say edit something on notepad and compile, does that mean afetr i edit and save i just double click compile and close?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 06, 2006, 07:37:51 PM[/size][hr]whats compile do???[br][size=1]Posted at: August 06, 2006, 08:36:13 PM[/size][hr]and how do i use it?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 06, 2006, 08:37:06 PM[/size][hr]any1?

Read full topic

item.description:
@_devil_666 wrote:

@echo off title ''yourservernamehere'' Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause

if thats what you mean. thats what i have inside my compile when i edit
